text:
Is there a way to install a Python package with Conda and pip from a github repository?

I am looking for the equivalent of
```run(`pip3 install --user --upgrade -e "git+<https://github.com/twintproject/twint.git@origin/master#egg=twint>"`)```
And if that’s not possible, how can I make sure that PyCall finds the package after I do `run(`pip3 install ...`)`  from within Julia?

This
```using Conda
run(`$(Conda._pip(Conda.ROOTENV)) install --user --upgrade -e "git+<https://github.com/twintproject/twint.git@origin/master#egg=twint>"`)```
seems to work.
